verses.verse: A Psalm<WH4210> of David,<WH1732> when he fled<WH1272> from<WH4480> <WH6440> Absalom<WH53> his son.<WH1121> LORD,<WH3068> how<WH4100> are they increased<WH7231> that trouble<WH6862> me! many<WH7227> are they that rise up<WH6965> against<WH5921> me.
Many <WH7227> there be which say<WH559> of my soul,<WH5315> There is no<WH369> help<WH3444> for him in God.<WH430> Selah.<WH5542>
But thou,<WH859> O LORD,<WH3068> art a shield<WH4043> for<WH1157> me; my glory,<WH3519> and the lifter up<WH7311> of mine head.<WH7218>
I cried<WH7121> unto<WH413> the LORD<WH3068> with my voice,<WH6963> and he heard<WH6030> me out of his holy<WH6944> hill.<WH4480> <WH2022> Selah.<WH5542>
I <WH589> laid me down<WH7901> and slept;<WH3462> I awaked;<WH6974> for<WH3588> the LORD<WH3068> sustained<WH5564> me.
I will not<WH3808> be afraid<WH3372> of ten thousands<WH4480> <WH7233> of people,<WH5971> that<WH834> have set<WH7896> themselves against<WH5921> me round about.<WH5439>

Arise, <WH6965> O LORD;<WH3068> save<WH3467> me, O my God:<WH430> for<WH3588> thou hast smitten<WH5221> <WH853> all<WH3605> mine enemies<WH341> upon the cheek bone;<WH3895> thou hast broken<WH7665> the teeth<WH8127> of the ungodly.<WH7563>
Salvation <WH3444> belongeth unto the LORD:<WH3068> thy blessing<WH1293> is upon<WH5921> thy people.<WH5971> Selah.<WH5542>
